name: Herman Mossur

list.heading: Freelance
list.position: Frontend, Backend, Admin, Designer, Tech Support
list.summary: Made some different projects: a video streaming room (like Skype), some landing pages, some social networks. I've used Angular2+, now I'm using SCSS, Vue stack (Vue 3, Nuxt 3, Pinia), Node.js + Express/Fastify, PostgreSQL/Firebase, other libraries & techs.

list.heading: UkrHMI
list.summary: Full name - Ukrainian Hydrometeorological Institute. I am developing new institute's web site and a project 'Agricultural Database of Ukraine' - interactive web map. I am using here Vue stack (Vue 3, Nuxt 3, Pinia), SCSS, Maptiler, other libraries.

list.heading: Maison Commerce
list.summary: This is a small company from the Netherlands with a lot of projects (mostly e-commerce). Mostly used Shopify, Tailwind, SCSS, other libraries. Quit due to constant rozzian missile & drone attacks on energy infrastructure of Ukraine => had no electricity to perform work in needed amount of tasks.

list.heading: CherryPie
list.summary: Made a web version of social network. Used Angular2+, Node.js + Express, SCSS, JS/TS, some other libraries. Quit due to COVID spread and some educational troubles.

list.heading: YourAirTest
list.summary: A project (based on the Noosphere tech school) to create interactive web-maps about air pollution. Used Angular2+, SCSS. Quit due to less interest in topic & changing of focus to educating myself.

list.heading: WheelKeep
list.summary: A startup (based on the Noosphere tech school) to create locking and tracking system for bikes. Used HTML/CSS/JS/Firebase. Also made design, mobile app prototype and wrote a marketology strategy. Quit after all my work has been done.

list.heading: University (DNU)
list.summary: Bachelor of Software Engineering, Master of Applied Math: Computed Modelling (in progress). It's an average university, where I was able to work with a lot of talented people, who helped me to learn more.

list.heading: High school (LIT)
list.summary: Good lyceum with Math/English/IT specialization. Gave me more real knowledge than usual school.

list.heading: Cources (ITStep)
list.summary: Not bad extra school (cources) to 'enter IT'.

nirvana: You have reached nirvana. Get back to your mortal world
Do you really want to reach nirvana twice? Some even can't do it once per 10 lives.
